title: Spicy strawberry and chilli jam
ingredients: ['300g strawberries, chopped', '250ml sweet red wine', '1 1/2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh root ginger', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '1 (7.5cm) cinnamon stick', '1 green chilli', '1 pinch crushed chillies', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon salt']
